item.text: Then Moses and the elders of Israel commanded the people: “Pay attention to all the commandments I am giving you today.
When you cross the Jordan River to the land the Lord your God is giving you, you must erect great stones and cover them with plaster.

Then you must inscribe on them all the words of this law when you cross over, so that you may enter the land the Lord your God is giving you, a land flowing with milk and honey just as the Lord, the God of your ancestors, said to you.

<st data-num="01961" class="">So</st> when you <st data-num="05674" class="">cross</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> you must <st data-num="06965" class="">erect</st> on <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="05858" class="">Ebal</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st> about <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="06680" class="">commanding</st> you <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st>, and you must <st data-num="07874" class="">cover</st> them with <st data-num="07875" class="">plaster</st>.
Then you must build an altar there to the Lord your God, an altar of stones—do not use an iron tool on them.
You must build the altar of the Lord your God with whole stones and offer burnt offerings on it to the Lord your God.
Also you must offer fellowship offerings and eat them there, rejoicing before the Lord your God.
You must inscribe on the stones all the words of this law, making them clear.”
Then Moses and the Levitical priests spoke to all Israel: “Be quiet and pay attention, Israel. Today you have become the people of the Lord your God.

You must <st data-num="08085 06963">obey</st> <st data-num="03068 0430">him</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="06213" class="">keep</st> his <st data-num="04687" class="">commandments</st> and <st data-num="02706" class="">statutes</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="06680" class="">giving</st> you <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st>.”

Moreover, <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="06680" class="">commanded</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>:

“The <st data-num="0428" class="">following</st> tribes<n id="1" /> must <st data-num="05975" class="">stand</st> to <st data-num="01288" class="">bless</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="01630" class="">Gerizim</st> when you <st data-num="05674" class="">cross</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st>: <st data-num="08095" class="">Simeon</st>, <st data-num="03878" class="">Levi</st>, <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, <st data-num="03485" class="">Issachar</st>, <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st>, and <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>.
And these other tribes must stand for the curse on Mount Ebal: Reuben, Gad, Asher, Zebulun, Dan, and Naphtali.
“The Levites will call out to every Israelite with a loud voice:
‘Cursed is the one who makes a carved or metal image—something abhorrent to the Lord, the work of the craftsman—and sets it up in a secret place.’ Then all the people will say, ‘Amen!’

‘<st data-num="0779" class="">Cursed</st><n id="1" /> is the one who <st data-num="07034" class="">disrespects</st><n id="2" /> his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> and <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>.’ Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="0543" class="">Amen</st>!’

‘<st data-num="0779" class="">Cursed</st> is the one who <st data-num="05253" class="">moves</st> his <st data-num="07453" class="">neighbor’s</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">boundary marker</st>.’ Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="0543" class="">Amen</st>!’

‘<st data-num="0779" class="">Cursed</st> is the one who <st data-num="07686" class="">misleads</st> a <st data-num="05787" class="">blind person</st> on the <st data-num="01870" class="">road</st>.’ Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="0543" class="">Amen</st>!’

‘<st data-num="0779" class="">Cursed</st> is the one who <st data-num="05186" class="">perverts</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">justice</st> for the <st data-num="01616" class="">resident foreigner</st>, the <st data-num="03490" class="">orphan</st>, and the <st data-num="0490" class="">widow</st>.’ Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="0543" class="">Amen</st>!’

‘<st data-num="0779" class="">Cursed</st> is the one who <st data-num="07901" class="">goes to bed</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> former <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="01540 03671">dishonors</st> his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>.’<n id="3" /> Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="0543" class="">Amen</st>!’

‘<st data-num="0779" class="">Cursed</st> is the one who <st data-num="07901 05973">commits</st> <st data-num="03605 0929">bestiality</st>.’<n id="1" /> Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="0543" class="">Amen</st>!’

‘<st data-num="0779" class="">Cursed</st> is the one who <st data-num="07901" class="">goes to bed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>, the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> of either his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>.’ Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="0543" class="">Amen</st>!’

‘<st data-num="0779" class="">Cursed</st> is the one who <st data-num="07901">goes to bed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="02859" class="">mother-in-law</st>.’ Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="0543" class="">Amen</st>!’

‘<st data-num="0779" class="">Cursed</st> is the one who <st data-num="05221" class="">kills</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="07453" class="">neighbor</st> in <st data-num="05643" class="">private</st>.’ Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="0543" class="">Amen</st>!’

‘<st data-num="0779" class="">Cursed</st> is the one who <st data-num="03947" class="">takes</st> a <st data-num="07810" class="">bribe</st> to <st data-num="05221 05315">kill</st> an <st data-num="05355" class="">innocent</st> <st data-num="01818" class="">person</st>.’ Then <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="0543" class="">Amen</st>!’
‘Cursed is the one who refuses to keep the words of this law.’ Then all the people will say, ‘Amen!’
